We offer a wide range of undergraduate and postgraduate programs across various disciplines, including engineering, management, and humanities.
Our course catalog includes over 50 programs, including B.Tech, M.Tech, MBA, and Ph.D.
You can find a list of our academic programs on our website, along with detailed information on each course.
We have a total of 10 departments, each offering a range of courses and programs.
Our departments include Computer Science, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, and more.
You can visit our website to explore our course catalog and learn more about our programs.
Some of the top government engineering colleges in Gujarat include L. D. College of Engineering, Sardar Vallabhbhai National Institute of Technology, and Gujarat Technological University.
Other government engineering colleges in Gujarat include Birla Vishvakarma Mahavidyalaya, Government Engineering College, Modasa, and Government Engineering College, Rajkot.
You can find a complete list of government engineering colleges in Gujarat on the official website of the Admission Committee for Professional Courses (ACPC).
